definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: The Dianchi Lake plays an important role in the industrial and agricultural production of Kunming Metropolitan and the everyday life of the people.
sentences.chinese: 滇池在昆明地區工農業生產和民人生活中起重要作用。

sentences.english: Modern industrial and agricultural production must rely on it.
sentences.chinese: 現代的工農業生產要靠電。

sentences.english: The contradiction between flood control and profit is getting increasingly serious as industry and agriculture develop.
sentences.chinese: 隨着工農業的發展，水庫防洪與興利矛盾日益突出。

sentences.english: The total value of industrial and agricultural output this year increased by seven percent over last.
sentences.chinese: 今年的工農業生產部值比去年的上升了百分之七。

sentences.english: Industrial production and agriculture exceeded pre-World War II levels.
sentences.chinese: 工農業生產超過了二次世界大戰前的水平。

sentences.english: Water pollution is one of problems Puzzling the development of industry and agriculture in Haiyin.
sentences.chinese: 水污染是困擾淮陰區工農業發展的問題之一。

sentences.english: Dnieper north-south central part of the shipping lines and major industrial and agricultural water.
sentences.chinese: 第聶伯河縱貫中部，是航運幹線和工農業主要水源。

sentences.english: These products can be widely used in the fields of the industrial and agricultural wrappage, and table-ware used once only etc.
sentences.chinese: 能廣泛應用於工農業包裝，一次性餐飲具等領域。

sentences.english: Scientific discoveries are often applied to industrial and agricultural production methods.
sentences.chinese: 科學發現常被應用於工農業生產方法上。

sentences.english: With the development of modern agriculture and industry, more and more waste is produced.
sentences.chinese: 隨着現代工農業的發展，污染越來越嚴重了。

sentences.english: Water pollution is becoming a world widely worried problem with the development of industry.
sentences.chinese: 隨着工農業生產的發展，水污染問題同益突出。

sentences.english: It is estimated that the gross annual value of industrial and agricultural output will be quadrupled.
sentences.chinese: 工農業總產值預計翻兩番。

sentences.english: The industrial and agricultural heartland was still in bad shape.
sentences.chinese: 在依賴工農業的中心地帶，經濟形勢仍然糟糕。

sentences.english: With the rapid development of agriculture and industry, more and more water is needed.
sentences.chinese: 隨着工農業的迅速發展，水的需要量越來越大。

sentences.english: To develop our industry and agriculture rapidly is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 迅速發展我們的工農業是必要的。

sentences.english: The serious lack of water resources is the main factor that restricts the development of industry and agriculture in Fucheng County.
sentences.chinese: 水資源匱乏是制約阜城縣工農業生產發展的主要因素。
